Articles.Content: I need some help getting mods with planets, for 1.1.3, doesn't need a mod to download that mod, easy to install
If I understand you correctly, you want a mod that adds planets that doesn't have any dependencies. This doesn't exist. AFAIK, all updated planet packs use kopernicus.

On 20/07/2016 at 10:06 PM, ExplorerKlatt said:

If I understand you correctly, you want a mod that adds planets that doesn't have any dependencies. This doesn't exist. AFAIK, all updated planet packs use kopernicus. 

Kinda, I mean a mod that does not need kopernicus, you are correct on that
